Hello,

Thanks for the reply Gabriel and Noah.

I am using Heritrix 3.1.1. =
It has a logging.properties file which has the setting:

# Enable logging o=
f uris rejected by scope by setting level to INFO.
org.archive.crawler.post=
processor.LinksScoper.level =3D INFO

I have enabled this but am not sure h=
ow to set the log path to where it is logged.

Thanks,
Sriram.

> Yes indee=
d. Also of note, if you enabled the setting "override-logger" on the LinksS=
coper, it will log to a separate file, logs/org.archive.crawler.postprocess=
or.LinksScoper.log by default. ("override-logger" does not set the log leve=
l, so you still need to adjust the level in heritrix.properties, as Gabriel=
 pointed out.)
